backend/main.mo: Motoko backend managing rooms, players, game state, drawings, and votes with functions for creating/joining rooms and starting games.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented feature IDs, associated files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing responsibilities of key frontend files including pages, components, hooks, and styles.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining OKLCH color variables, theming rules, and dark mode overrides.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React app root and main script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component controlling navigation between home, lobby, and game screens with QueryClientProvider and global game context.
frontend/src/components/DrawingScreen.ts: Turnâ€‘based drawing component handling canvas strokes, timers, local previews, stroke submission, and transition on completion.
frontend/src/components/ResultsScreen.ts: Displays round results, determines eliminated player and win conditions, and allows host to trigger next round.
frontend/src/components/RoleRevealScreen: Displays the player's role with a countdown and triggers onComplete after the timer ends.
frontend/src/components/VotingScreen.tsx: Lets active players vote for a suspected spy, tracks selections, and proceeds once all votes are in.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, invalidating related queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handling login, stored identities, and login state tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for room actions like creating, joining, polling state, drawing submissions, and voting.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base setup defining theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with InternetIdentityProvider and React Query client.
frontend/src/pages/GamePage.tsx: Coordinates the game flow screens based on backend state while managing local transition control.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: UI for creating or joining a room, handling name input, room code generation, and navigation to the lobby after successful mutations.
frontend/src/pages/LobbyPage.tsx: Displays room state, resolves player ID, shows players, and allows the host to start the game when conditions are met.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Project state metadata tracking game summary, known issues, and pending feature requests.
